conclusion: Analyze the flow of liquid through the depicted system of baffles and containers.
Determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.

Liquid flows from A to B, then to C.

Liquid will flow through the baffles from A to B, then to C.
Liquid flows from A to B, then to C, and will flow into container C.
Liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
Flow of liquid through the system is determined by the arrows and direction through the baffles.
Final container to which the liquid flows is determined by the path through the baffles.
